PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Recently , to further lower the bandgap of PCDTBT without sacrificing its high V OC , Hsu et al.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| bandgap |
| V OC |

The two "Property Name" entities in the paragraph are "bandgap" and "V OC". These terms are used to describe the properties of a material called PCDTBT. "Bandgap" refers to the energy difference between the valence band and the conduction band in a solid, while "V OC" likely refers to the open-circuit voltage, which is a measure of the maximum voltage that can be generated by a solar cell made from the material.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| bandgap |

The only clear "Material Property" entity in the paragraph is "bandgap". The term "V OC" is not a material property, but rather a property of a device made from a material. Therefore, it should not be included in the list of material properties.

Paragraph: Recently , to further lower the bandgap of PCDTBT without sacrificing its high V OC , Hsu et al.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| bandgap of PCDTBT |
| high V OC |

| Property Value |
| --- |
| the bandgap of poly[N-9,N-9]-dioctylfluorene-co-bis-N-naphthyl-N-phenylamino-bithiophene (PCDTBT) |
| high open-circuit voltage (V OC) |

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| bandgap of PCDTBT |
| high V OC |

The entity "high V OC" can be interpreted as a value of the material property open-circuit voltage (Voc), even though it is not a specific numerical value.
